TMC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 16 Pharmacist Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 22, 2025, 10:49 IST
 Tata Memorial Centre
 16 Jobs |  Posted On : 22-Aug-2025 |  Uttar Pradesh |  Salary : 17,524 to 25,506




FOLLOW

The Tata Memorial Centre (TMC) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 16 Pharmacists, Multi-Tasking Staff, Housekeeper, Kitchen Assistant, and Butler Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Pharm, D.Pharma, 12th, Diploma, and B.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the TMC Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the interview at the address given below.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Uttar Pradesh.

TMC Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualifcation
Pharmacist,	03	B.Pharm, D.Pharm
Multi-Tasking Staff	06	12th
Housekeeper	01	B.Sc
Kitchen Assistant	02	Diploma
Butler	04	12th, Diploma

Age Limit for the TMC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 18 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 30 years.

Selection Process for the TMC Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the TMC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 17,524 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 25,506 /- per month.

Application fee for the TMC Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the TMC Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Pharmacist Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Then, attend the interview along with the documents required at the address given below.

Venue

Mahamana Pandit Madan Mohan Malviya Cancer Centre, Sunder Bagiya, B.H.U. Campus, Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh – 221005

Important Dates

Start Date of Interview	25-08-2025
Last Date of Interview	26-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
